Text.val: Online maintenance program for QuickView Plus settings
04.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
19.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
Create QVPR record from defaults (in case its not yet existing)
delete temporary files which have been created during testing ....
Launch QuickView Plus and gather screen coordinates ...

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Drag the icon on the left over any window and release it. Factorlink will use the coordinates of this window for QuickView position in the future')
